# 데이터

남극 펭귄 연구소에...

- 아델리
- 젠투
- 턱끈



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins_raw <- read_csv("https://gist.githubusercontent.com/slopp/ce3b90b9168f2f921784de84fa445651/raw/4ecf3041f0ed4913e7c230758733948bc561f434/penguins.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 344 Columns: 9
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (3): species, island, sex
dbl (6): rowid, bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, flipper_length_mm, body_mass_...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::


# 데이터 전처리


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins <- penguins_raw %>% 
  drop_na()

penguins %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 10)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 10 × 9
   rowid species   island    bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm
   <dbl> <chr>     <chr>              <dbl>         <dbl>             <dbl>
 1   302 Chinstrap Dream               52            19                 197
 2    72 Adelie    Torgersen           39.7          18.4               190
 3   188 Gentoo    Biscoe              48.4          16.3               220
 4   327 Chinstrap Dream               48.1          16.4               199
 5     3 Adelie    Torgersen           40.3          18                 195
 6   202 Gentoo    Biscoe              45.2          15.8               215
 7   312 Chinstrap Dream               47.5          16.8               199
 8   259 Gentoo    Biscoe              41.7          14.7               210
 9    18 Adelie    Torgersen           42.5          20.7               197
10   249 Gentoo    Biscoe              49.4          15.8               216
# ℹ 3 more variables: body_mass_g <dbl>, sex <chr>, year <dbl>
```


:::
:::



# EDA

## 체중과 물칼퀴 관계


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes (x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g,
              color = species)) +
    geom_point() +
    facet_wrap(~island)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


아델리 펭귄은 성격이 좋지 않아서 토르겐섬에 혼자 삶.

## 표


```{mermaid}
install.packages("gt")

install.packages("gtExtras")

library(gt)

library(gtExtras)

penguins %>%
  group_by(species) %>%
  summarise(평균_부리길이 = mean(bill_length_mm),
            평균_부리깊이 = mean(bill_depth_mm)) %>%
  
  gt() %>%
  fmt_number(
  columns = c(평균_부리길이, , 평균_부리깊이),
  decimals = 1,
  suffixing = FALSE
  ) %>%
  gtExtras::gt_theme_nytimes()

```



# 모형
